title: US-Iran tension: Why Tehran may choose confrontation over 'surrender'
description: The Iranian leadership is weighing up whether resisting US demands is the best option for its survival.
content:
The continued build-up of US military in the Gulf region now points less to signalling and more to preparation.
The arrival of the USS Abraham Lincoln carrier strike group near Iranian waters is already a significant move.

title: UK has not given US permission to use RAF bases for Iran strikes
description: It comes as US President Donald Trump criticises Sir Keir Starmer's deal to hand over the Chagos Islands.
content:
The British government has not given permission for the US to use UK military bases to support potential US strikes on Iran, the BBC understands.
The US has in the past used RAF Fairford, in Gloucestershire, and the UK overseas territory of Diego Gar... [3964 chars]

title: Man arrested after two teenagers found dead at Yorkshire holiday park
description: Girl, 15, and boy, 17, found dead at Little Eden holiday park in suspected carbon monoxide poisoning, police say
content:
Two teenagers have died at a holiday park on the Yorkshire coast in a suspected carbon monoxide poisoning.
A 15-year-old girl and 17-year-old boy were found dead inside a rental property at Little Eden holiday park in Bridlington on Wednesday, police... [1797 chars]

title: Trump says world has 10 days to see if Iran agrees deal or 'bad things happen'
description: The US is surging forces to the Middle East amid negotiations with the Islamic Republic over its nuclear programme.
content:
President Donald Trump says the world will find out "over the next, probably, 10 days" whether the US will reach a deal with Iran or take military action.

title: Two teenagers found dead at holiday park in Yorkshire
description: A 33-year-old man was arrested on Thursday on suspicion of gross negligence manslaughter and remains in custody, police said.
content:
A man has been arrested after two teenagers were found dead at a holiday park in east Yorkshire.
Police were called to Little Eden Holiday Park in Bridlington on Wednesday, where a 15-year-old girl and a 17-year-old boy were found dead inside one of ... [1308 chars]
